channel.title: ML on AesVoy
channel.description: Recent content in ML on AesVoy

item.title: Less is More Paper Review
item.description: Less is More: Parameter-Free Text Classification with Gzip offers a novel text classification method using gzip compression, eliminating manual parameter tuning.

item.title: Infini-Attention Paper Review
item.description: Infini-Attention introduces a novel approach to scaling Transformer models for infinitely long inputs while managing memory and computation.

item.title: Softmax
item.description: Softmax stands as a pivotal component in neural network architectures, offering a means to convert raw scores into interpretable probabilities.
